Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies

Class ScheduleShortestTimeToDeadlineFirst

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduling.schedulingStrategies.ScheduleShortestTimeToDeadlineFirst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchedulingStrategy

    public class ScheduleShortestTimeToDeadlineFirst
extends java.lang.Object
implements SchedulingStrategy
    This class implements a scheduling strategy that uses a heurist, which minimizes the SLA costs of a job, to determine the order in which the jobs are scheduled.
    Author:
    nilsw

      • scheduleNextInterval

        public void scheduleNextInterval​(java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                 java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                 java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                                 java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                 int intervalLength,
                                 int currentTime,
                                 int[] nodeOccupationPlan,
                                 DC handledDC)
        Description copied from interface: SchedulingStrategy
        Schedules the workload for the upcoming "normal" interval of the specified length in simulation time.
        Specified by:
        scheduleNextInterval in interface SchedulingStrategy
        Parameters:
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        submittedJobs - List of all currently submitted jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        intervalLength - Length of the interval that should be scheduled in simulation time.
        currentTime - Point in time at which the scheduled interval starts.
        nodeOccupationPlan - Array that contains the blocked node sums for each timestep in the scheduled interval.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler component that calls this strategy belongs.
